original_title: The Murals of East Los Angeles: A Museum Without Walls
overview: “In recent years East Los Angeles, like many other Barrios in the  United States, has taken on a new look. Chicano artists are changing the environment with  a multitude of murals that express Chicano concerns and aspirations.”  Featuring the work of artists Carlos Almaraz, Judy Baca, Richard Ruiz, and Eduardo Ortiz.
title: The Murals of East Los Angeles: A Museum Without Walls
